title: Adriana Lima puts on a leggy display in a black leather mini skirt leaving a photo shoot in New York
text:
She's known for her glamorous sense of style.

And Adriana Lima once again cut a chic figure as she exited a photo shoot in New York on Friday.

The Brazilian supermodel, 38, put on a stylish display in an edgy leather mini skirt and navy blue blazer as she made her way out of the shoot in the Big Apple.

Looking good: Adriana Lima, 38, cut a chic figure in a black leather mini skirt on Friday as she beamed with delight after leaving a photo shoot in New York

As ever Adriana was effortlessly chic as she headed out of the shoot and into the city, and flashed a hint of her slender pins in the black leather skirt.

The fashion favourite also opted for a navy blue blazer and matching top, and added some extra height with black leather platform boots.

Adriana carried her essentials in two contrasting printed handbags, and pulled her raven tresses into a sleek up-do.

Looking good: The Brazilian supermodel, 38, put on a stylish display in an edgy leather mini skirt and navy blue blazer, and added some height with matching platform boots

Adriana was seen without her new Turkish businessman boyfriend Emir Uyar - who she was first spotted with in July.

Emir's family own a chain of luxury hotels and he is the Board Member of Turkey's Permak Group and is popular among the celebs, having hosted glitzy soirees frequented by Lindsay Lohan.

Adriana split from her self-help writer beau Metin Hara earlier this year, after 18 months together.

The runway star has two daughters by her Serbian athlete ex-husband Marko Jarić - nine-year-old Valentina and six-year-old Sienna.

Stunning: Adriana first walked the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in 1999 at Cipriani Wall Street in New York, and was garlanded an Angel the following year (pictured last month)

Adriana first walked the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in 1999 at Cipriani Wall Street in New York, and was garlanded an Angel the following year.

She has walked every single Victoria's Secret Fashion Show between 1999 and 2018 - except the 2009 event, which was held four days after she delivered her firstborn.

Adriana left after the 2018 show and it has since emerged that the Victoria's Secret Fashion Shows will no longer be broadcast on network television.
description: The Brazilian supermodel, 38, put on a stylish display in an edgy leather mini skirt and navy blue blazer as she made her way out of the fashion shoot in New York on Friday.
